inapplicable.description: Ensures <dl> elements are structured correctly

inapplicable.description: Ensures <input type="image"> elements have alternate text

inapplicable.help: <object> elements must have alternate text

passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(2) > header:nth-child(1) > nav:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > nav > h5:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(2) > main:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > h1
html > body > div:nth-child(2) > main:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div > div:nth-child(3) > article > div > div > div:nth-child(3) > h5:nth-child(2)
